messages.title: Brexit done. Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go.
Support for the NHS, 50,000 more nurses and 50 million extra GP surgery appointments.
More funding for every pupil in every school.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting Brexit done with our deal.
issues.economy: A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school.
issues.governance: The country needs a majority government.
issues.health: Support for the NHS, 50,000 more nurses and 50 million extra GP surgery appointments.

contactInformation.address: Disraeli House, 12 Aylesbury End, Beaconsfield, HP9 1LW

endorsements.endorsement: I’m asking you to use your postal vote for Joy Morrissey in Beaconsfield.

quotes.text: Let's get Brexit done so the country can finally move on.

images.caption: Prime Minister and Leader of the Conservative Party
